title: Lisa Monaco and Wayne Williams on Protecting the 2018 Election
itunes:title: Lisa Monaco and Wayne Williams on Protecting the 2018 Election
itunes:subtitle: Episode 304
description:
Eric Rosenbach moderates a conversation between former homeland security adviser Lisa Monaco and current Colorado Secretary of State Wayne Williams on election security.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/lawfare.
